title: Strengthening Practical AI Competencies: TPACK-Based Instructional Design for Geometric Lesson Technology Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental geometric concepts and LMS (Learning Management System) experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Acquiring instructional design skills to apply the three core elements of the TPACK framework (Technology/Pedagogy/Content) to geometry
Developing and implementing at least three technology integration strategies when teaching geometric concepts using LMS-based collaboration tools
Designing technology-enhanced lessons that improve learner engagement by over 20% through project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
